data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 33,900 people living in Umm Salal through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Umm Salal, Qatar

data.prayer: Over 93.8 percent of the people of Umm Salal are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 121 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 280 believers in Umm Salal and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Umm Salal to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Umm Salal, Qatar to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 33,620 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Umm Salal, Qatar, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Umm Salal, Qatar with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.
